_question._questionText: <div><p>If you are taking a World Campus course and wish to drop it, go to</p><p><a target="_blank" href="http://student.worldcampus.psu.edu/your-courses-how-to-guide/dropping-a-course">http://student.worldcampus.psu.edu/your-courses-how-to-guide/dropping-a-course</a></p><p>and review the drop policy. There are financial penalties when you drop a World Campus course. See the refund table for more information at:</p><p><a target="_blank" href="http://www.bursar.psu.edu/adjustments.cfm">www.bursar.psu.edu/adjustments.cfm</a></p><p>Did you check out these sites and do you understand the penalty for dropping this course?<br />(Select any/all that apply)</p></div><div></div>
_question._qtiXml: <assessmentItem identifier="" title="Course Description, Drop or Withdrawal"><responseDeclaration identifier="RESPONSE" baseType="identifier" cardinality="multiple"><correctResponse><value>answerChoice1</value><value>answerChoice2</value></correctResponse><mapping lowerBound="0"><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice1" mappedValue="0.5" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice2" mappedValue="0.5" /><mapEntry mapKey="answerChoice3" mappedValue="-0.5" /></mapping></responseDeclaration><outcomeDeclaration identifier="SCORE" baseType="float" cardinality="single"><defaultValue><value>0</value></defaultValue></outcomeDeclaration><itemBody><![CDATA[<div><p>If you are taking a World Campus course and wish to drop it, go to</p><p><a target="_blank" href="http://student.worldcampus.psu.edu/your-courses-how-to-guide/dropping-a-course">http://student.worldcampus.psu.edu/your-courses-how-to-guide/dropping-a-course</a></p><p>and review the drop policy. There are financial penalties when you drop a World Campus course. See the refund table for more information at:</p><p><a target="_blank" href="http://www.bursar.psu.edu/adjustments.cfm">www.bursar.psu.edu/adjustments.cfm</a></p><p>Did you check out these sites and do you understand the penalty for dropping this course?<br />(Select any/all that apply)</p></div>]]><choiceInteraction responseIdentifier="RESPONSE" maxChoices="0" shuffle="False"><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice1">Yes, I read the World Campus drop policy.</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice2">I understand there are financial penalties when I drop a World Campus course.</simpleChoice><simpleChoice identifier="answerChoice3">I did not read the drop policy.</simpleChoice></choiceInteraction><![CDATA[<div></div>]]></itemBody><outcomeDeclaration identifier="FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" cardinality="multiple" /><outcomeDeclaration identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK" baseType="identifier" cardinality="single" /><responseProcessing><setOutcomeValue identifier="FEEDBACK"><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></setOutcomeValue><responseCondition><responseIf><isNull><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></isNull><setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE"><baseValue baseType="integer">0</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="SCORE"><mapResponse identifier="RESPONSE" /></setOutcomeValue><responseCondition><responseIf><match><correct identifier="RESPONSE" /><variable identifier="RESPONSE" /></match><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">CORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseIf><responseElse><setOutcomeValue identifier="GENERAL_FEEDBACK"><baseValue baseType="identifier">INCORRECT_FEEDBACK</baseValue></setOutcomeValue></responseElse></responseCondition></responseElse></responseCondition></responseProcessing></assessmentItem>
